column5: GH I have owned TMO for a long time As an investor I would not blink if they bot GH for 25billion and used their unbelievable sales force and operational abilities to jump start an already killer business ILMN TMO would drop initally but id just buy more Just like when roche bot Foundation medicine RHHBY
GH the other thing you cant underestimate is that the big buyers are near recent highs TMO ILMN etc When their equity is at new highs they get more inquisitive

GH I can make a strong case that this could go up 100 before the end of the year The TAM is huge20b ann rev they are the leader Could become the standard of care over regular biopsy new insurance recommendations to come ILMN IBB In at 35 out of some for a while now at 200 avg position
